frame_map_import_err_config_file_is_dire: Path at "%configFile%" is not a file! That path needs to point to a map config file!
frame_map_import_err_icon_file_is_direct: Path at "%iconFile%" is not a file! That path needs to point to an icon file!
frame_map_import_err_icon_file_is_type_e: Icon file "%iconFile%" doesn't seem to be a valid image!
frame_map_import_err_music_file_is_direc: Path at "%musicFile%" is not a file! That path needs to point to a music file!
frame_map_import_err_resource_file_dne: Resource file at "%resourceFile%" does not exist!
frame_map_import_err_resource_file_is_di: Path at "%resourceFile%" is not a file! That path needs to point to a resource file!
frame_map_import_err_resource_file_type_: Resource file "%resourceFile%" doesn't seem to be a valid image!
frame_map_import_err_resource_dir_creati: Resource directory at "%resourceDir%" could not be created!
frame_map_import_err_write_config_err: Could not write config file at "%cpOut%"
result_map_parse_fail_undefined: Failed to parse map for an undefined reason!
result_map_parse_fail_no_json_data: Failed to parse map, either no data was provided or it was not valid!
result_map_parse_fail_missing_array_elem: Failed to parse map, missing array element %value%!
result_map_parse_fail_missing_value: Failed to parse map, missing value %value%!
result_map_parse_fail_invalid_value: Failed to parse map, invalid %valueType% value %value%!
result_map_parse_fail_unrecognized_event: Failed to parse map, unrecognized event type %eventType%!
result_map_parse_fail_multi_hand_map: Cannot use this map. This is a multi-hand map, which is not supported by this editor. Please use the in-game editor to edit this map.

frame_preferences_save_fail_workspace_di: Failed to save preferences, cannot use that workspace directory!
frame_pre_welcome_save_fail_workspace_di: Failed to save preferences, cannot use that directory as the workspace!
frame_control_reference_text:
Shortcuts

Play / pause - F8
Rewind 5 seconds - F7
Forward 5 seconds - F9
Move to previous event - Cmd + [
Move to next event - Cmd + ]
Undo operation - Cmd + Z
Redo operation - Cmd + Shift + Z
Delete arc selection - Cmd + Delete


Playback control bar

Set playback location - Left Mouse
Play / pause - Right Mouse


Event display window

Delete arc - Shift + Left Mouse
Delete checkpoint - Ctrl + Left Mouse
Move checkpoint - Shift + Ctrl + Left Mouse
Move closest event (or selection) - Left Mouse drag
New selection - Right Mouse drag
Additive selection - Shift + Right Mouse drag
Subtractive selection - Ctrl + Right Mouse drag
Inverse selection - Shift + Ctrl + Right Mouse drag


Event display window with keyboard focus

Create checkpoint - F
Create "PowerUp" arc - G
Create "Up" arc - W
Create "Left" arc - A
Create "Down" arc - S
Create "Right" arc - D
Create timing event - Q
Create title event - E
Create background/foreground event - Z
Create distance modifier event - X
Create color event - C
Create combo event - R
Create "Left-Up-Right" arc - Shift + W
Create "Up-Right" arc - Shift + E
Create "Up-Right-Down" arc - Shift + D
Create "Right-Down" arc - Shift + C
Create "Right-Down-Left" arc - Shift + X
Create "Down-Left" arc - Shift + Z
Create "Down-Left-Up" arc - Shift + A
Create "Left-Up" arc - Shift + Q
Create "Up-Right-Down-Left" arc - Shift + S
Create "Up-Down" arc - Shift + R
Create "Left-Right" arc - Shift + F
frame_editor_exit_confirm: Do you want to save your map before exiting?
